text: Allah akwamanyilila chenene akutengusya (ŵandu kuti akajaula kungondo pamo ni Ntume ﷺ) mwa jenumanja, ni ŵaakutiji pakwasalila achimijao: “Ikani kukwetu (nkaliwanga ni Muhammadi ﷺ ntakwika mun’jonasiche najo imo).” Nambo soni ŵanganyao (achimisyene) ŵangaika kungondo ikaŵeje panandipe (mwandola ni kogopa nchesela)
